description:
A standard single-factor authentication template which uses Pay-to-Public-Key-Hash (P2PKH), the most common authentication scheme in use on the network.

This P2PKH template uses BCH Schnorr signatures, reducing the size of transactions. Because the template uses a Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) key, it also supports an "Observer (Watch-Only)" entity.

observer.description: An entity which can generate addresses but cannot spend funds from this wallet.
observer.name: Observer (Watch-Only)

owner.description: The individual who can spend from this wallet.
owner.name: Owner

key.description: The private key which controls this wallet.
key.name: Key

name: Single Signature (P2PKH)
